segments.text: How do I take the tablets ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Please take 2 tablets each time , 4 times a day .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How do I take the sucking lozenges ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Please put one under your tongue , do not swallow it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How do I take the pills ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Please dissolve one pill in water before taking it .
segments.speaker: S2
